participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and energetic, enjoys engaging with others and making a difference.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i like to workout a a times a week. i enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Reflective and somewhat melancholic, struggles with personal issues but seeks connection.
participant_2.background: i work at a nursing home. i am overweight and unhappy. my wife left me and took my children. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i don't believe in god.
